isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - CLEAN AND INSPECT - LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE

svcproc.title: LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 16for all items in parentheses.

step1.para: Using mineral spirits or an equivalent solvent, clean and thoroughly dry all metal parts. Do not damage bores with metal tools.

Inspect the interior and exterior of all metal parts that will be reused for severe corrosion, pitting, and cracks. Superficial corrosion and/or pitting on the exterior portion of the body (Item 13) and cover (Item 9) is acceptable. Replace the entire valve if the interior of the body or cover exhibits signs of corrosion or pitting.
Inspect the bores of the body (Item 13) and cover (Item 9) for deep scuffing or gouges. Replace the entire valve if either defect is found.
Make certain all air channels are clear and free of obstruction.
Inspect all pipe threads and make certain they are clean and free of thread sealant.
Inspect all air line fittings for corrosion and replace as necessary. Make certain to remove all old thread sealant before reuse.
